reference.shortdesc: The hasRelated element specifies that the contained subjects have an associative relationship with the container subject.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The hasRelated element is specialized from topicref. It is defined in the subject scheme module.

div.p: The following attributes are available on this element: , , processing-role, keys, and keyref.

example.title: Example

draft-comment.author: Kristen J Eberlein
draft-comment.p: This example needs to be replaced,but I honestly do not understand the intent of the element enough to do that currently.

example.p: This example specifies that myProgram runs on Linux and Windows.
